body:
Declare @ITObjectID int

Set @ITObjectID =  $SELECTIONSTART$ ITObjectID Yİ HA PURYA YAPİŞTUR $SELECTIONEND$

Update IT15_ObjectsD Set CaptionSize = 9 Where ITObjectID = @ITObjectID And IsNull(CaptionSize,0) < 9
Update IT15_ObjectsD Set CaptionSize = 24 Where ITObjectID = @ITObjectID And IsNull(CaptionSize,0) > 24



;WITH ASD AS (

	Select	ITObjectDID, 5*ROW_NUMBER() over(order by ShowSiraNo) AS ShowSiraNo
	from	IT15_ObjectsD 
	Where	ITobjectID = @ITObjectID
			And ShowSiraNo > 1

)
UPDATE	OD Set ShowSiraNo = T.ShowSiraNo
From	IT15_ObjectsD OD
		INNER JOIN ASD T ON T.ITobjectDID = OD.ITObjectDID
		
Where  	1 = 1
